section.title: Community Support
section.p: For community support, check out the Discussion Forum.
section.note: You have to register a JavaForge account to post forum messages and submit issues.

section.title: Commercial Support
section.p: We believe in open source and we build our solutions using a stack of carefully selected open source projects. These projects include, but are not limited to:

ul.li: Spring Framework, Quartz Scheduler, Hibernate, JBoss
DWR, Wicket, Prototype, Rico, script.aculo.us, Dojo
Ant, JUnit and of course Scriptella

section.p: We also have a strong experience in migration between databases and application servers. Typically our customers migrate from commercial vendors like BEA, IBM, Sybase or Oracle to open source solutions (e.g. JBoss, Tomcat, MySQL etc.)
Just drop me a line if you are interested in high-quality outsorcing and consulting services for an affordable price.

section.title: Issue Tracker
section.p: If you think that you've found a bug or want to propose a feature to implement? Use JavaForge project Issue Tracker.
